content: hey folks I have released a blog on my EPF work for PEPC-Boost in this tweet thread https://twitter.com/BharathVedarth1/status/1712156150102446356 Please do check it out!

author: joshd4078
content:
For those of you that struggle with writing dev updates or generally want to improve confidence with public writing, Ethereum.org is running the next cohort of their writers workshop. 

https://ethereumwriterscohort.carrd.co
